<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[18, 7, 600, 40]]<|/det|>
## Ableitung mittels Differenzquotient : 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[50, 46, 201, 80]]<|/det|>
\[f(x) = x^2\]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[50, 80, 536, 153]]<|/det|>
\[\frac{\Delta y}{\Delta x} = \frac{f(x+\Delta x) - f(x)}{\Delta x} = \frac{(x+\Delta x)^2 - x^2}{\Delta x}\]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[50, 152, 960, 198]]<|/det|>
\[= \frac{x^2 + 2 \cdot \Delta x \cdot x + \Delta x^2 - x^2}{\Delta x} = \frac{2 \Delta x \cdot x + \Delta x^2}{\Delta x} = \frac{\Delta x (2x + \Delta x)}{\Delta x} = 2x + \Delta x\]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[50, 183, 540, 228]]<|/det|>
\[f'(x) = \lim_{\Delta x \to 0} \frac{\Delta y}{\Delta x} = \lim_{\Delta x \to 0} (2x + \Delta x) = 2x\]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[70, 243, 444, 273]]<|/det|>
\[\rightarrow f(x) = x^2, \quad f'(x) = 2x\]

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[18, 301, 240, 328]]<|/det|>
## Monom - Regel : 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[50, 336, 694, 405]]<|/det|>
\[f: A \subseteq \mathbb{R} \to \mathbb{R}, \quad f(x) = x^p \quad \text{mit } p \in \mathbb{R} \setminus \{0\}\]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[50, 380, 280, 411]]<|/det|>
\[f'(x) = p \cdot x^{p-1}\]

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[18, 439, 333, 466]]<|/det|>
## Bsp : 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[50, 435, 800, 666]]<|/det|>
\[\begin{aligned}
\text{Bsp :} \quad \bullet & \quad f(x) = x^5 \\
& \quad f'(x) = 5 \cdot x^4 \\
\bullet & \quad f(x) = \frac{1}{x} = x^{-1} \\
& \quad f'(x) = -x^{-2} = -\frac{1}{x^2} \\
\bullet & \quad f(x) = \sqrt{x} = x^{\frac{1}{2}} \\
& \quad f'(x) = \frac{1}{2} x^{\frac{1}{2} - 1} = \frac{1}{2} x^{-\frac{1}{2}} = \frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{1}{x^{\frac{1}{2}}} = -\frac{1}{2 \cdot \sqrt{x}}
\end{aligned}\]

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[18, 692, 145, 719]]<|/det|>
## Regeln : 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[50, 725, 585, 794]]<|/det|>
\[\bullet \quad f(x) = a \cdot g(x) \quad \text{Produktregel}\]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[50, 825, 587, 895]]<|/det|>
\[\bullet \quad f(x) = g(x) + h(x) \quad \text{Summenregel}\]
